Package gov.sandia.geotess.extensions.rstt

Class UncertaintyPIU

java.lang.Object
gov.sandia.geotess.extensions.rstt.Uncertainty
gov.sandia.geotess.extensions.rstt.UncertaintyPIU
public class UncertaintyPIU
extends Uncertainty
Class to manage path independent model uncertainty for travel time, slowness, and azimuth. TT in seconds, Slowness in sec/radian Azimuth in radians.
Author:
jrhipp, sballar

  • Field Summary

  • Constructor Details

    • UncertaintyPIU

      public UncertaintyPIU()
      Default constructor

    • UncertaintyPIU

      public UncertaintyPIU​(int phase, int attribute)
      Parameterized Uncertainty Constructor used by SLBM. phase is one of "Pn", "Sn", "Pg", "Lg". attribute is one of "TT", "Sh", "Az"
      Parameters:
      phase - input phase number.
      attribute - input attribute number.

    • UncertaintyPIU

      public UncertaintyPIU​(java.lang.String phase, java.lang.String attribute)
      Parameterized Uncertainty Constructor used by SLBM. phase is one of "Pn", "Sn", "Pg", "Lg". attribute is one of "TT", "Sh", "Az"
      Parameters:
      phase - input phase string.
      attribute - input attribute string.

    • UncertaintyPIU

      public UncertaintyPIU​(java.io.File fileName, java.lang.String phase, java.lang.String attribute, boolean readBinary) throws java.io.IOException
      Standard constructor that reads the objects contents from the input file path.
      Parameters:
      fileName - The file from which the object is read.
      phase - The objects phase number.
      attribute - The objects attribute number.
      readBinary - Reads binary format if true (else ascii format is read).
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException

  • Method Details

    • getDistances

      public double[] getDistances()
      An array of doubles representing the angular distances (in degrees) for which the model errors are defined.
      Returns:
      The array of distances

    • getDepths

      public double[] getDepths()
      An array of doubles representing the depths (in km) for which the model errors are defined. If empty there is no depth dependence
      Returns:
      The array of depths

    • getValues

      public double[][] getValues()
      A array of double[nDepths][nDistances] representing the model uncertainties. TT in seconds, Slowness in sec/radian Azimuth in radians.
      Returns:
      The array of model errors[nDepths][nDistances].

    • getUncertainty

      public static UncertaintyPIU getUncertainty​(java.util.Scanner input, int phase, int attribute) throws java.io.IOException
      Static factory method to load an existing UncertaintyPIU from a file.
      Parameters:
      input -
      phase - The phase of the uncertainty file to be loaded.
      attribute - The attribute of the uncertainty file to be loaded.
      Returns:
      The new UncertaintyPIU object if successful, or null otherwise.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException

      Reads this SLBM uncertainty object from a file.

    • readFileAscii

      public void readFileAscii​(java.io.File fileName) throws java.io.IOException
      Reads this SLBM uncertainty object from an ascii file. File stores tt uncertainty in sec, slowness uncertainty in sec/degree, and azimuth uncertainty in degrees. Slowness and azimuth are converted to sec/radian and radians, respectively.
      Specified by:
      readFileAscii in class Uncertainty
      Parameters:
      fileName -
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException

    • readFileBinary

      public void readFileBinary​(java.io.File fileName) throws java.io.IOException
      Reads this SLBM uncertainty object from a binary file. File stores tt uncertainty in sec, slowness uncertainty in sec/degree, and azimuth uncertainty in degrees. Slowness and azimuth are converted to sec/radian and radians, respectively.
      Specified by:
      readFileBinary in class Uncertainty
      Parameters:
      fileName -
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException

    • writeFile

      public void writeFile​(java.io.File fileName, boolean writeBinary) throws java.io.IOException
      Writes this SLBM uncertainty object to a file. File stores tt uncertainty in sec, slowness uncertainty in sec/degree, and azimuth uncertainty in degrees. Slowness and azimuth in memory have units of sec/radian and radians, respectively.
      Specified by:
      writeFile in class Uncertainty
      Parameters:
      fileName -
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException
